bucketParam.name: bucket
bucketParam.description: The bucket name to retrieve the objects

maxParam.name: max
maxParam.description: The number of objects to return

prefixParam.name: prefix
prefixParam.description: The path name where the document is located in the bucket

versionIdParam.name: versionId
versionIdParam.description: The version id of the document

toRestoreParam.name: toRestore
toRestoreParam.description: Indicates if the file come from the trash or not, with the purpose to send a specific message
